scripts.start: npm run build:debug; npm run watch & npm run serve & npm run livereload
scripts.build:debug: npm run clean:debug; npm run mkdir; npm run compile;
scripts.build:release: npm run build:debug; sleep 1; npm run minify; sleep 1; npm run clean:release; npm run scaffold
scripts.mkdir: mkdir -p debug & mkdir -p debug/js & mkdir -p debug/css
scripts.compile: npm run compile:coffee & npm run compile:stylus & npm run compile:jade
scripts.watch: npm run watch:coffee & npm run watch:stylus & npm run watch:jade
scripts.watch:coffee: gaze 'npm run compile:coffee; npm run notify-reload' 'src/coffee/**/*' --silent
scripts.watch:stylus: gaze 'npm run compile:stylus; npm run notify-reload:css' 'src/stylus/**/*' --silent
scripts.watch:jade: gaze 'npm run compile:jade; npm run notify-reload' 'src/jade/**/*' --silent
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js & npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: uglifycss debug/css/index.css > debug/css/index.temp.css; cp debug/css/index.temp.css debug/css/index.css; rm debug/css/index.temp.css
